committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

official_title: A bill to authorize the adjustment of the boundaries of the South Dakota portion of the Sioux Ranger District of Custer National Forest, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Agriculture to accept title to any non-federally-owned lands located within five miles of the exterior boundaries of the South Dakota portion of the Sioux Ranger District of Custer National Forest in exchange for national forest lands in such Forest.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the adjustment of the boundaries of the South Dakota portion of the Sioux Ranger District of Custer National Forest, and for other purposes.
